perspective.

	int iterations = 1;
	String perspectiveName = "org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugPerspective";

	 * Constructor for OpenCloseDebug.

		super(testName);
	}
	/**
	 * Open all of the perspectives registered.Test how long each

		IWorkspace work = ResourcesPlugin.getWorkspace();
		IWorkbenchWindow win =
			PlatformUI.getWorkbench().openWorkbenchWindow(
				perspectiveName,
				ResourcesPlugin.getWorkspace());
		win.close();

	}
}
